attributes.review: this app literally hacked me and stole all of my personal information and then i ended up receiving texts threatening me with my address and phone number and some even had my credit card number. I HATE THIS APP

attributes.review: there are already so many problems with this app, but what surprised me the most is that it called me slurs and told me back to go back to my country😿😾. then, this app attempted to MURDER me just for saying im not a fan of cheetos. this app needs to be sent to prison for a very long time😤🙈❤️✨

attributes.review: A SCAM: I downloaded this app and it asked my for my social security number, credit card number, address, birthday, and birth certificate. The trump administration committed fraud and identity theft so he could vote for himself! I had to change everything and move!
attributes.title: The worst app on the AppStore

attributes.review: This app has so much fake news!!!! Honestly not even worth to spend my money on in app purchases! Why do we need to purchase stuff for news ?? Very bad, Not helpful at all. My republican dad can do better than this.
attributes.title: trump supporters

attributes.review: This Cheeto actually expects us to support him. He wants us to rsvp and register to events during this pandemic. I rsvp’d but sadly I’m busy so there might be an empty seat. I didn’t check my calendar and forgot my chinchilla has a hairline transplant appointment. My bad, I tried.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: I opened the app to see what it was about and I was a churro with a face😂😳 you know I’m really sad the app was NO good🙄 but whatever🙄 can’t blame the app the creator has no brain so I forgive the app🙄🤷🏻‍♀️but really you could’ve tried harder😬🙄 such a disappointment😳🙄😬😬sorry to burst your bubble😬😬😬😬😳😳😳😂😂🛣🛣🛣🙄🙄🙄
